message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to offer it to you at a competitive price. After careful consideration, we're willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality product at a discount from its true value.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, we're still not quite there yet. After re-evaluating our options, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're willing to sell the product to you for $925000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to us, and we believe it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a discount.
